message.body: Yeah, but I think that variety is known as bears head tooth
As opposed to the ones that look like Pom poms and are also known as which
Sweet!!! Are they tasty?!? Thanks for sharing your fungi genius (:

I only found that kind once and it wasn't as fresh as that specimen. Tasted a little acrid, but typically lions mane is delicious. Sautéed with greens brings out the scallop or crab flavors of lions mane
